maxflow14.graph

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • maxflow14.graph.Graph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class models a graph it implementents the interface Serializable to store and load an graph
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Graph()
      Constructor: Creates a graph with zero nodes and an empty _AdjacencyMap
      Graph(Graph g_in)
      Constructor: Creates a graph with all the nodes of g_in no edge will be taken over
